name: unsupervised-generation
description: This script generates all the BigML unsupervised models for a given dataset

inputs.name: dataset
inputs.description: Origin dataset id for the creation of the models

inputs.name: cluster-params
inputs.description: Params of the cluster model. Leave blank for default 1-Click cluster

inputs.name: exclude-objective
inputs.description: Excludes objective field from the dataset (default: True)

inputs.name: association-params
inputs.description: Params of the association discovery. Leave blank for default 1-Click association discovery

inputs.name: anomaly-params
inputs.description: Params of the anomaly detector. Leave blank for default 1-Click anomaly detector

inputs.name: topic-params
inputs.description: Params of the topic model. Leave blank for default 1-Click topic model

inputs.name: pca-params
inputs.description: Params of the PCA model. Leave blank for default 1-Click PCA

outputs.name: association-leverage-id
outputs.description: Generated association discovery using leverage as search strategy

outputs.name: association-lift-id
outputs.description: Generated association discovery using lift as search strategy
